core.common.toast.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
core.ccdupdate.generic.update.failed: Creative Cloud desktop failed to update.
core.ccdupdate.admin.priviledge.needed: We need your system administrator password to continue the update. Select Retry, then follow the instructions in the OS prompt.
core.ccdupdate.ipc.failure: Something went wrong and we weren’t able to update the Creative Cloud app.
core.ccdupdate.package.not.genuine: There seems to be a problem with the downloaded file(s). For troubleshooting tips, please visit our customer support page.
core.ccdupdate.insufficient.disk.space: Insufficient hard disk space. Please free up some more space and try again.
core.ccdupdate.file.access.error: Installer was unable to access a critical file/directory. Please try installing again.
core.ccdupdate.another.installer.running: Another installer is currently running, which must be closed before updating this product. Please close other installers.
core.ccdupdate.aam.running: Adobe Application Manager is currently running, which must be closed before updating this product. Please close or wait for it to complete.
core.ccdupdate.aam.notifier.running: Adobe Application Manager Notifier is currently running, which must be closed before updating this product. Please close or wait for it to complete.
core.ccdupdate.aamdetect.plugin.loaded: Please close Internet Browsers and relaunch Creative Cloud desktop to complete your update. You can launch the application from the Start Menu, or your Program Files folder.
core.ccdupdate.pim.status.download.inval: There seems to be a problem with download.
core.ccdupdate.pim.status.download.error: Something went wrong while updating Creative Cloud. Cancel the update and launch it again to retry.
There seems to be a problem with the file download. For troubleshooting tips, please visit our customer support page.
core.ccdupdate.pim.status.extraction.err: There seems to be a problem in extracting files. It could be because there is no space on the disk. For additional troubleshooting tips, please visit our customer support page.
core.ccdupdate.network.unavailable.tryin: Your computer appears to be offline. Trying to connect to the server…
core.ccdupdate.server.unresponsive: The server is currently not responding. Please try after some time.
core.ccdupdate.disk.full.error: There seems to be a problem with the download due to limited disk space. For troubleshooting tips, please visit our customer support page.
core.ccdupdate.write.permission.error: You do not have permission to download a file on this system.
core.ccdupdate.download.process.error: There seems to be a problem with the download process. For troubleshooting tips, please visit our customer support page.
core.ccdupdate.creative.cloud.update.suc: Creative Cloud has been updated to the latest version
core.ccdupdate.ccd.new.version.available: A new version of Creative Cloud is now available and will be installed when you restart the app.
core.ccdupdate.updatedialog.title: Creative Cloud update available
core.ccdupdate.updatedialog.description: We fixed bugs and improved the Creative Cloud experience.
core.ccdupdate.updatedialog.switchlabel: Always keep Creative Cloud up to date

core.ccdupdate.updatescreen.description: This section has been updated. Please refresh to continue.

core.ccdupdate.async.update.failed: The Creative Cloud app failed to update.
core.ccdupdate.hostFileError.message: You may have limited access to Adobe apps or services
core.ccdupdate.toast.relaunchinfo: Creative Cloud will relaunch automatically after the update is complete.

core.signout.desc.main: Please note that the following items or functions will be disabled until you sign in again:
core.signout.desc.point.2: All active library and cloud documents syncing
core.dialogs.quit.title: Quit
core.dialogs.quit.duringUpdate.title: Update in progress
core.dialogs.quit.header: Are you sure you want to quit? You can hide Creative Cloud instead to keep your active installs, updates, and uploads running in the background without interruption.
core.dialogs.quit.duringUpdate.header: Are you sure you want to quit? If you quit now, the update will be interrupted.
core.dialogs.quit.duringUpdate.header.de: You can hide Creative Cloud instead to keep your active installs, updates, and uploads running in the background without interruption.
core.dialogs.quit.activeSession.header: If you quit Creative Cloud, ongoing tasks will be disrupted. To ensure they’re complete, you can keep Creative Cloud open or hide it.
core.dialogs.quit.activeSession.desc.mor: {appStatus} of {appName} ({version}), {appName2} ({version2}), and more will be disrupted.
core.dialogs.quit.activeSession.desc.two: Updates to  {appName} ({version}) and {appName2} ({version2}) will be disrupted.
core.dialogs.quit.activeSession.desc.mor: Updates to  {appName} ({version}), {appName2} ({version2}), and more will be disrupted.
core.dialogs.quit.activeSession.desc.add: Management of some add-ons will be disrupted.
core.dialogs.quit.activeSession.desc.fil: Uploading or downloading of some files will be disrupted.
core.dialogs.relaunch.title: Relaunch
core.dialogs.relaunch.desc: If you relaunch now, any app installations or updates currently in process will be canceled
core.dialogs.installapp.title: Install {appName}
core.dialogs.installapp.desc: {appName} is needed in order to open this file. Would you like to install it now?
core.container.proxy.server.login.text: Please provide the username and password for your proxy server
core.container.delayed.loading.toast.con: Creative Cloud is taking longer than usual to load.
Creative Cloud is taking longer than usual to load. Relaunch Creative Cloud or restart your computer and try again.
core.container.nointernet.dialog.title: Unable to reach Adobe servers
core.container.nointernet.dialog.content: Please check your firewall settings, ensure that the time settings on your computer are correct, and try again.
core.container.nointernet.toast.desc: You are offline. Some experiences may be unavailable.
comment.topBarMenu.start: Top Bar Menus locale code start
core.tour.installationDialog.progress.co: You can track your installation progress under cloud activity
core.tour.installationDialog.installed.c: Check here for installation progress or other cloud activity status messages.
core.tour.discoverDialog.title: Get to know {appName}
core.tour.discoverDialog.content: Pick up some basic concepts right away, find project ideas, and continue building your ideas after you’ve started working in the app
core.tour.discoverDialogNthApp.title: Discover {appName}
core.tour.discoverDialogNthApp.content: See what's possible and find resources to help get started.
core.tour.homeDialog.title: Try the new Home tab
core.tour.homeDialog.description: Quickly launch your installed apps, get suggestions, access your recent files, and more.
core.tour.mp.photos.title: Photos
core.tour.mp.fonts.title: Fonts
core.tour.mp.plugins.title: Plugins
core.tour.mp.3d.title: 3D assets
core.tour.mp.photos.description: Access millions of photos for your creative projects. Browse collections, or start a new search.
core.tour.mp.fonts.description: Thousands of fonts are included in your subscription. Easily find and activate fonts by searching the library or browsing through foundries, tags, recommendations, and more.
core.tour.mp.plugins.ltd.description: Manage plugins that improve workflows for your apps.
core.tour.mp.plugins.description: Discover and manage plugins that improve workflows for your apps. Browse featured plugins, or search by app and category.
core.tour.mp.3d.description: Browse 3D materials, atlases, decals, and more to use in Substance 3D apps.
comment.topBarMenu.end: Top Bar Menus locale code end
core.onboarding.screen1.title: Welcome to Creative Cloud
core.onboarding.screen1.description: Find and update your Adobe apps, libraries, and more.
core.onboarding.screen2.title: Creative Cloud app updates
core.onboarding.screen2.description: Need to update your Creative Cloud apps? We’ll let you know when it’s time.
core.onboarding.screen3.title: More info on Adobe apps
core.onboarding.screen3.description: Find the best app for anything you want to create.
core.onboarding.screen4.title: Important notifications
core.onboarding.screen4.description: Check your sync status, view notifications from all your Adobe apps, and connect to other services.
core.onboarding.screen5.title: Search
core.onboarding.screen5.description: Find what you’re looking for, whether it’s in Adobe apps or your own work.
core.onboarding.screen6.title: Cloud documents and libraries
core.onboarding.screen6.description: Access work easily across all of your devices with cloud documents. Collect, manage, and share what you use most in libraries.
core.discover.onboardingNUJ.screen.title: Discover Creative Cloud
core.onboardingNUJ.screen.title: Welcome to Adobe Creative Cloud
core.onboardingNUJ.apps.title: MANAGE YOUR APPS
core.onboardingNUJ.yourwork.title: ACCESS FILES
core.onboardingNUJ.discover.title: BUILD YOUR SKILLS
core.discover.onboardingNUJ.screen.app.d: This is Creative Cloud on your desktop. See what's possible with {appName}, start learning, and find resources to help get started in Discover.
core.onboardingNUJ.screen.app.descriptio: This is Creative Cloud, on your desktop, and it’s installing Adobe {appName} for you now. This is where you’ll find and manage your Adobe apps, files, creative inspiration and resources, and more. As soon as the installation is done, {appName} will open automatically.
core.onboardingNUJ.screen.ccd.descriptio: This is Creative Cloud, on your desktop. It’s where you’ll find and manage your Adobe apps, files, creative inspiration and resources, and more.
core.onboardingNUJ.screen.ccd.auEnabled: Creative Cloud will keep all your installed apps up-to-date automatically. You can adjust this in Preferences.
core.nuj2.title: While you wait for it to install, let's set your {appName} preferences
core.nuj2.description: Answer a couple questions to get a personalized intro with tutorials, project ideas, free downloadable assets, and more.
core.nuj2.discovertab.unavailable.descri: Answer a couple of questions about your goals and proficiency to personalize your in-app content and tutorials.
core.nuj2.question.error.description: Something went wrong while saving your {appName} preferences
core.nuj2.question.error.description.gen: Something went wrong while saving the preferences
core.container.unabletoreach.servers.dia: Please check your firewall settings, ensure that the time settings on your computer are correct, and try again.

core.about.title: Adobe Creative Cloud
core.about.sub.title: Version
core.container.imserror.dialog.title: You’ve been signed out
core.container.imserror.dialog.content: Please sign in again to continue using Adobe apps.
core.container.webarticle.mustbeconnecte: You must be connected to the internet to view this page.
core.container.webarticle.pageunavailabl: This page is not currently available
core.container.panel.mp.name: Marketplace
core.container.panel.mps.name: Stock & Marketplace
core.container.error.boundary.heading: Page unavailable
core.container.error.boundary.text: We can't load this content, Please try again later.
core.onboarding.whatsNew.title: What’s new in Creative Cloud
core.onboarding.whatsNew.content: View your apps and plugins in new ways, and manage your documents and fonts right within the app.
core.onboarding.newWays.title: Find the right apps for your projects
core.onboarding.newWays.content: Browse the apps in your plan based on categories and what’s useful for your projects. Plus, learn more about each app with more detailed information.
core.onboarding.plugins.title: Browse libraries and plugins
core.onboarding.plugins.content: Explore the new Marketplace to find public libraries and thousands of plugins.
core.onboarding.fonts.title: Manage all of your fonts
core.onboarding.fonts.content: Use Creative Cloud for desktop to add your own font files and manage them alongside your Adobe fonts.
core.onboarding.cloudDocs.title: Preview your cloud documents
core.onboarding.cloudDocs.content: Manage and view detailed previews of cloud documents in Files.
core.onboarding.liveStream.title: View livestreams on desktop
core.onboarding.liveStream.content: Watch Adobe Live directly in the Creative Cloud desktop app.
core.container.videoconflictdialog.title: Play new video?
core.container.videoconflictdialog.descr: You are currently watching a livestream on your desktop. Would you like to watch the new livestream instead?
core.container.whatsNewToast.content:
You can find What's new again anytime
in the Help menu.

core.container.coppacompliant.toast.desc: Please update your account details now for uninterrupted access to Creative Cloud apps and services
core.container.loggedout.asyncupdate.tit: Creative Cloud update is in progress. You can sign in when the update is completed
core.gcconsent.dialog.desc.normal: To help protect you from security vulnerabilities and harmful malware that may be present in non-genuine Adobe apps, AGS will periodically check for non-genuine Adobe apps on this machine. If any are detected, you may be notified and Adobe may disable the non-genuine Adobe app.
core.gcconsent.dialog.desc.reask: There was an issue with AGS on your machine and we need to install it again.
core.gcconsent.dialog.desc.reask.continu: AGS will periodically check for non-genuine Adobe apps on this machine. If any are detected, you may be notified and Adobe may disable the non-genuine Adobe app.
core.gcconsent.dialog.title: Install Adobe Genuine Service (AGS)
core.gcconsent.notification.title: Creative Cloud
core.gcconsent.toast.success: Adobe Genuine Service (AGS) has been installed
core.gcconsent.toast.error.retry: Something went wrong when installing Adobe Genuine Service.
core.gcconsent.toast.error: Something went wrong when installing Adobe Genuine Service. We'll remind you later.
Something went wrong. Refresh the Creative Cloud app to continue.
core.noInternet.title: No internet connection
core.noInternet.description: You can still access some features offline. For the full experience of this app, please connect to the internet.
core.dialogs.installapp.trialavailable.d: {appName} is needed in order to open this file. Would you like to install it now and start a free trial?
core.dialogs.installapp.trialexpired.des: {appName} is needed in order to open this file. Would you like to buy it now?
core.dialogs.installapp.licenseactive.de: {appName} is needed in order to open this file. Would you like to install it now?
core.dialogs.notcompatible.title: OS update required for {appName}
core.dialogs.notcompatible.desc: Your operating system does not support latest version of {appName}. Review the system requirements and update your OS.
core.dialogs.update.desc: Newer version of app is needed in order to open the file. Would you like to install it now?
core.toast.updateinprogress: {appName} will open after update is complete
core.toast.installinprogress: {appName} will open after installation is complete
core.loginitem.dialog.desc: To turn on login items, go to System Settings and toggle on the Adobe Creative Cloud option. The following functions will not work unless the login items are turned on.
core.loginitem.dialog.title: Turn on login items
core.loginitem.dialog.learnMore: Learn more about the impact of login items.
core.loginitem.dialog.autoupdate.desc: Your apps will not be kept up-to-date automatically.
core.loginitem.dialog.sync.desc: Your files, libraries, and fonts will not be auto-synced to the cloud.
core.loginitem.dialog.notification.desc: Notifications on any changes or updates will be suspended.
core.onboarding.checklist.toast.desc: You can always re-enable the checklist from the menu bar Help > Quick start guide
core.onboarding.checklist.error.label: Cannot fetch details due to a network issue. Please try again.
core.notificationsSettings.dialog.title: Enable Creative Cloud desktop notifications
core.notificationsSettings.dialog.desc: Instantly know when someone shares work or feedback with you and stay up to date with the latest app versions. Desktop notifications can be configured in System Settings
core.preferences.notificationsSettings.a: Instantly know when someone shares work or feedback with you and stay up to date with the latest app versions. Desktop notifications can be configured in System Settings.
